title: Dead msv key in portalModulePageMap
description: portalModulePageMap contains 'msv: MSVPage' but no manifest module has base='msv'. MSVPage is a redirect stub to /portal/immobilien/verwaltung. Dead code.

evidence.output_excerpt:
ManifestRouter.tsx:113 — const MSVPage = React.lazy(() => import('@/pages/portal/MSVPage'));
ManifestRouter.tsx:299 — msv: MSVPage,

impact: No runtime impact — key is never matched since no module has base='msv'. Pure dead code.
suspected_root_cause: MSV module was consolidated into MOD-04 Verwaltung; map entry was not cleaned up.

steps: Remove 'msv: MSVPage' from portalModulePageMap in ManifestRouter.tsx
Remove MSVPage lazy import from ManifestRouter.tsx
verification: Grep for 'msv' in ManifestRouter.tsx — should return 0 hits

title: MOD-10 naming inconsistency: Abrechnung vs Provisionen vs /leads
description: Manifest defines MOD-10 name as 'Abrechnung', spec file is 'mod-10_provisionen.md' with title 'Provisionen', and the route base is '/leads'. Three different names for one module.

evidence.output_excerpt: MOD-10: { name: 'Abrechnung', base: 'leads', ... tiles: [{ path: 'uebersicht', component: 'ProvisionenUebersicht' }] }

impact: Confusing for developers. No runtime impact. R2 frozen rule mandates route stays '/leads'.
suspected_root_cause: Module was renamed from Leads to Provisionen to Abrechnung across sprints; spec and route not synchronized.

steps: Decide canonical name (product decision): 'Abrechnung' (current manifest) recommended
Rename spec file to mod-10_abrechnung.md and update title
Update component name ProvisionenUebersicht to AbrechnungUebersicht (optional)
verification: Grep MOD-10 across manifest, spec, and component names — all should use same term

title: Missing optional spec directories (03_actions, 04_workflows, 05_diagrams)
description: spec/current/ lacks 03_actions, 04_workflows, and 05_diagrams directories. These are documented as optional in audit policy but referenced in prior audit reports.
impact: Documentation gap only. Armstrong actions are in armstrongManifest.ts, Golden Paths in src/manifests/goldenPaths/. No implementation risk.
suspected_root_cause: Directories were planned but never created; implementation moved to TypeScript manifests instead.

steps: Create spec/current/03_actions/ with index referencing armstrongManifest.ts
Create spec/current/04_workflows/ with index referencing goldenPaths/
